snippet: The bond of affection and regard between the vice president and the former secretary of state is by all accounts genuine and of long standing, but it has also endured many strains.
abstract: Friendship between Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr and Hillary Rodham Clinton is being tested anew as curiosity grows about their possible presidential candidacies for 2016, and Biden finds himself being eclipsed once again by Clinton; Biden's longtime political advisers grow easily exasperated about the subject and wonder how a sitting vice president who was highly engaged in the administration can be so easily overlooked.
lead_paragraph: The bond of affection and regard between the vice president and the former secretary of state is by all accounts genuine and of long standing, but it has also endured many strains.

headline.main: Biden and Clinton: Friends With Awkward Twist
headline.print_headline: Biden and Clinton: Friends With Awkward Twist
